title: New Guard
description: James Adams returns as old guard, controller for Cherub agent new guard Ryan Sharma. Undercover Cherubs can slip below adult radar for information that sends criminals and terrorists to jail. But undercover are not recognized for good results or bad, and punishment is ... off with their heads. The mission is a double kidnapping by oil terrorists to Syria. The Cherubs assemble a team of legendary agents to find the two hostages and bring them home.
author: Robert Muchamore
